page.title: 11THE COSSACK AND THE ALTMARCK
page.content:
{ THE COSSACK AND THE ALTMARCK}
The "Altmarck" was a German prison ship.Its prisoners were taken from British merchant ships that were sunk by German Battleships. The "Cossack" was a British Battleship which wanted to capture the "Altmarck". In the course of a battle between the "Cossack" and the "Altmarck" 8 members of the crew of H.M.S. "Cossack" were killed. The crew members who were killed are buried in Seafield Cemetery. The date on the graves is 7th September 1939. Two years later in 1941 H.M.S. "Cossack" was sunk by a U boat west of Gibraltar.
